p: A total of 145 patients were included in this study; 62.8% of patients were male, the median age (IQR) was 41.1 (19.5) years, n = 4 (2.8%) were coinfected with HIV, n = 6 (4.1%) had cirrhosis, n = 135 (93.1%) were treatment-na√Øve, and GT1 in n = 82 (56.6%) followed by GT3 in n = 56 (38.6%) were the most frequently detected GT ( Table 1).
